thread.title: Top 10 K-pop fandoms in the Philippines
thread.title_full: Top 10 K-pop fandoms in the Philippines

title: Top 10 K-pop fandoms in the Philippines
text:
Top 10 K-pop fandoms in the Philippines INQUIRER.net / 08:01 PM February 28, 2017 
There’s no doubt that the Hallyu wave is taking the Philippines by storm. Left and right you can find K-pop related merchandise ( *ehem* EXO and BTS shirts *ehem* ) and hearing their songs in public ( “Fantastic Baby”, anyone? ) is becoming more and more common. 
Their success is rooted from the hard work they’ve put into their craft—from the intensive Korean training programs to the hectic schedules of on-demand idols—and of course, we’ve got to give due thanks to the fans! 
Speaking of fans, the fandom culture in K-pop groups is highly regarded. These fangirls/boys take their job (fangirling/boying) seriously. Do not mess with them! ADVERTISEMENT 
In line with this, the following is a list of fandoms that are believed to be the major fandoms in the Philippines. 
(Reminder: this list is in alphabetical order—so there’s no need for one fandom to be jealous of another, ’cause we’re all in this together!) Image: K-Pop Herald
